attributes.action: Stop the demolition of the "Get Carter Car Park" - Trinity Court Shopping Centre in Gateshead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Request to stop the demolition of Owen Luder's "Get Carter Car Park' (or Trinity Court) by Tesco and Gateshead Council, in recognition of its cultural and historic importance both as a piece of post war "Brutalist" Architecture and as an iconic landmark that should be protected for the future.
